DOC.brief_summary: New payment method Accountable Care Organization ( ACO 's ) medical home facilitate new model provider deliver cost effective , quality patient outcome . Integrated Care Coaching ( ICC ) healthcare delivery model combine telephonic intervention intelligent information technology platform offer validated protocol patient outcomes track . Health Integrated , Inc. develop validate program Integrated Care Coaching ( ICC ) , brand `` VitalCare '' , implement 7,000 member Scott White Health Plan Texas , would reduce healthcare costs/achieve return investment ( ROI ) , improve clinical outcome , satisfy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Data Analysis VitalCare Targeted Population Management Scott White Chronically Ill Beneficiaries
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , pre-post historical control design trial concurrent control group cost/satisfaction analysis retrospective clinical study undertaken adult , Scott White Health Plan ( SWHP ) patient chronic illness . From 2007 2010 , total 7,411 ICC 10,148 control patient participate . Variables cost , return investment ( ROI ) , iterative Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ ) 9 score , satisfaction .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Having one 21 chronic condition , include depression multiple chronic comorbidities . Presence Major Cancer , HIV , ESRD either baseline measurement period Claims excess $ 100,000 either baseline intervention period . Claims long term care hospice either baseline intervention period .
